items.sentence: I wasn\'t surprised when Tom told me why he didn\'t like Mary.
I wish that I hadn\'t promised Tom I\'d go to Boston with him.
Would you tell me why you don\'t want to go to Boston with us?
I wonder why I always become drowsy whenever I begin to study.
Mary smiled when she noticed that Tom was staring at her legs.
I thought you knew Tom and Mary were both allergic to peanuts.
I thought you knew both Tom and Mary were allergic to peanuts.
Tom and Mary got married when they were both thirty years old.
Tom claims that he knows the value of pi to a thousand places.
I didn\'t realize that my wallet was missing until I got home.
I don\'t know how to say exactly what I want to say in French.
I was surprised when Tom told me Mary didn\'t have to do that.
Tom can\'t remember exactly when he first met Mary\'s parents.
Tom smashed the old furniture to pieces and then he burned it.
Tom stopped smoking cigarettes because his doctor told him to.
Tom said Mary was driving the car at the time of the accident.
Tom is convinced that Mary is the one that stole his clarinet.
Tom told Mary he was planning to stay in Boston until October.
I was surprised when Tom told me Mary didn\'t need to do that.
I was surprised when Tom told me Mary didn\'t want to do that.
